How I got intrested in Jekyll

I got interested in Jekyll when I found out that it was a great static website generator. I have been blogging on wordpress since 2010 but I thought that having a static website would be great. There are a couple reasons why I like jekyll more than wordpress.

Better interface

All of my workflow is setup in my terminal and when I use github to host my blog, I can simply use my terminal to manage my blog.
